eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN IMMEDIATE EVACUATION NOTICE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Boulder, CO; AT 03:28 AM ON OCT 09, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 04:28 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Emergency officials have issued an EVACUATION ORDER at 03:28:41 on 10-09-2025 due to fire at the caribou village shopping center. occurring in the area of bridge to to peakview and nw to hy 119 and east east to 295 alpine to boulder canyon/hurricane hill.  Click www.BOCO911Alert.org for a map of the affected area and detailed information.
